1096890.name: 3D Custom Lady Maker - Summer Style Pack
1096890.description:
Get ready for summer with the Summer Style Pack for 3D Custom Lady Maker!
This pack contains all of the various pre-order bonuses that were available for the Japanese release, collected for the first time in one place, along with several new items and customization options!

Features

  • Five new two-piece swimsuits. Mix and match to find your favorite look. Cool off and show some skin!
  • Three new one-piece swimsuits. Cool off while preserving your modesty!
  • One all-new pair of summer sandals. Keep the heat off your feet!
  • One all-new pair of heart-shaped sunglasses. Protect your custom 3D lady's eyes from harmful UV rays in style!
